original_text: And you have declared this day how you have dealt well with me, in that you did not kill me when the Lord put me into your hands.
korean_text: 네가 나 선대한 것을 오늘 나타냈나니 여호와께서 나를 네 손에 넘기셨으나 네가 나를 죽이지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: And you have declared this day
how you have dealt well with me
in that you did not kill me
when the Lord put me into your hands
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 나를 당신 손에 넘겨주셨을 때
